content: mantra mat bag shelby knits new year new you new yoga mat bag this bag is worked in the round from the bottom up and features an openwork body pattern drawstring closure and integrated strap materials as written 350 yards 320 meters /160 grams washable worsted weight yarn such as berroco vintage in two colors approximately 80 grams each solid variation 350 yards 320 meters /160 grams washable worsted weight yarn such as berroco vintage in one color see variations scrap variation pictured 350 yards 320 meters /160 grams washable worsted weight yarn such as berroco vintage in any number of colors see variations 16 40 cm circular or double pointed needles size 6 4 mm or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker tapestry needle to weave in ends optional longer circular or waste yarn for size checks size approximately 16 inch 40 cm circumference 26 inches 66 cm tall gauge 6 stitches per inch 2 5 cm in stockinette stitch gauge is not critical abbreviations co cast on k knit p purl yo yarn over k2tog knit two together p2tog purl two together kfb knit into front and back of next stitch * repeat between * as instructed bottom with color a co 12 with circular cast on join to knit in the round and pull yarn end to snug up the center of the cast on place marker to indicate beginning of the round round 1 and all odd rounds knit round 2 *k2 yo* to end round 4 *k3 yo* to end round 6 *k4 yo* to end round 8 *k5 yo* to end round 10 *k6 yo* to end round 12 *k7 yo* to end round 14 *k8 yo* to end round 16 *k9 yo* to end round 18 *k10 yo* to end round 20 *p31 p2tog* twice you should now have 64 stitches on the needles mantra mat bag page 1 of 3 shelby knits body round 1 with color a knit round 2 with color a *yo k2tog* to end round 3 with color b knit round 4 with color b *yo k2tog* to end repeat these four rounds until body of bag is approximately the same length as your rolled yoga mat when lightly stretched this section of the prototype bag is about 23 inches 58 cm tall note this stitch pattern is very stretchy so be sure that you are really giving it a good stretch when measuring you may wish to place your stitches on a long circular or waste yarn to try it on your mat top work top in color a round 1 knit round 2 purl round 3 *k2 p2* to end work round 3 for 1 inch 2 5 cm eyelet round *k2tog yo p2* to end work round 3 for 1 inch 2 5 cm bind off very loosely in pattern break yarn strap with color b pick up and knit 8 stitches of purl row formed by top round 2 turn kfb in each
